A

addUpdateListener(UpdateListener) - Method in class twooter.TwooterClient
Add an object implementing the UpdateListener interface to the list of objects to be notified on live feed events.

C

CONNECT - Static variable in class twooter.TwooterEvent
 

D

disableLiveFeed() - Method in class twooter.TwooterClient
Disables (and disconnects from) the live feed service.
DISCONNECT - Static variable in class twooter.TwooterEvent
 

E

enableLiveFeed() - Method in class twooter.TwooterClient
Enables (and connects to) the live feed service.
expires - Variable in class twooter.Message
The number of seconds until this message expires and is removed

G

getMessage(String) - Method in class twooter.TwooterClient
Retrieves a single message from Twooter, using the message ID.
getMessages() - Method in class twooter.TwooterClient
Retrieves a small number of messages from Twooter service (up to a maximum of 30) and returns them as an Array of Messages.
getMessages(String) - Method in class twooter.TwooterClient
Retrieves a small number of messages from the Twooter service for a specific user (up to a maximum of 30 messages) and returns them as a Message array.
getTagged(String) - Method in class twooter.TwooterClient
Retrieves a list of message IDs for messages tagged with the supplied tag.
getTypeAsString(int) - Method in class twooter.TwooterEvent
 

H

handleUpdate(TwooterEvent) - Method in interface twooter.UpdateListener
This method will be called whenever a new event happens at the web service.

I

id - Variable in class twooter.Message
This message unique ID
isActiveName(String) - Method in class twooter.TwooterClient
Contacts the Twooter service to check if a name exists and is active.
isFeedConnected() - Method in class twooter.TwooterClient
Used to determine if the live feed is connected for this client.
isUp() - Method in class twooter.TwooterClient
Attempts to determine if the web service is both online and reachable.

M

Message - Class in twooter
An immutable container class for a single Twoot
Message(String, String, String, long, long) - Constructor for class twooter.Message
Creates a new twooter.Message, which is then immutable
message - Variable in class twooter.Message
The message contents itself

P

Defines the payload for this event.
postMessage(String, String, String) - Method in class twooter.TwooterClient
Posts a message to the Twooter feed.
published - Variable in class twooter.Message
When the message was publised, as a UNIX timestamp in seconds.

R

refreshName(String, String) - Method in class twooter.TwooterClient
Refresh the token timeout for a particular username.

Attempt to register a new username.
removeUpdateListener(UpdateListener) - Method in class twooter.TwooterClient
Removes the supplied object from the event listener list, halting any further events from being sent to it.

T

TAG - Static variable in class twooter.TwooterEvent
 
time - Variable in class twooter.TwooterEvent
The timestamp from when this event occurred (client-side timestamp) as a UNIX timestamp in seconds.
toString() - Method in class twooter.Message
Returns a human-readable form of this message, as a String.
toString() - Method in class twooter.TwooterEvent
Overridden toString method to present human-readable events if this object is used with any String operations, such as printing to the terminal.
twooter - package twooter
 
TwooterClient - Class in twooter
The official Twooter client library for Java!
TwooterClient() - Constructor for class twooter.TwooterClient
Creates a new client instance
TwooterEvent - Class in twooter
When subscribed to Twooter live feed events, a series of this object type will be created and passed to the listening code.
TwooterEvent(int, String) - Constructor for class twooter.TwooterEvent
Creates a new TwooterEvent, this is done automatically by the TwooterClient when it receives an event from the web service, but is made public here should you wish to do so yourself manually too.
type - Variable in class twooter.TwooterEvent
Defines the type of event this is, should be one of the following constants: { CONNECT, DISCONNECT, MESSAGE, USER, or TAG } Immutable (cannot be changed)

U

UpdateListener - Interface in twooter
To receive 'live feed' updates from the Twooter service, you need to implement this interface.
USER - Static variable in class twooter.TwooterEvent
